name: EJEN ALI: MATA TRAINING ACADEMY (Android) W.I.P
name_original: EJEN ALI: MATA TRAINING ACADEMY (Android) W.I.P
description:
Ejen Ali: M.A.T.A. Training Academy is a Multi-Tap and Action Packed 2D Game.

Join our hero Ejen Ali as he goes through a challenging training programme to sharpen his skills as a M.A.T.A secret agent, armed with the IRIS super-intelligence device and his mad yoyo skills.

TRAINING ACADEMY
Defeat the Drone Robots using yoyo blasts! Quick reflexes is your best hope to survive in this endless training programme challenge!

TEAM
Teamwork is Important! Ejen Comot will come to aid you as a sidekick during the battle! Beat the Monster Robot with Ejen Comot’s help!

LEVEL PROGRESSION
Battle against the enemies and complete new levels in the training programme to earn a new Alicia Costume!

GADGET IRIS
As an Agent, you will have the IRIS Gadget to aid you in battle!

• Defeat the Drone Robots using yoyo blasts!
Quick reflexes is your best hope to survive in this endless training programme challenge!

• Slow down enemies in IRIS mode!
As an Agent, you will have the IRIS Gadget to aid you in battle!

• Beat the Monster Robot with Ejen Comot’s help!
Teamwork is Important! Ejen Comot will come to aid you as a sidekick during the battle! Game Belongs To ©Media Prima Digital, ©FaridTE31TDG, ©Ejen Ali.
